title: why are there so many free champions this week?
body: why are there so many free champions this week?

replies.body:
As mentioned in [this post](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/free-rotation/extra-supports-free-champion-rotation) we added 10 extra champions to try out a wide variety of playstyles in the support role.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
